name: Snopek Adventure
description:
A short adventure game starring my daughters, Sasza & Ewa, with an SNES-era JRPG aesthetic.

It was created in one week during the Godot Wild Jam #24.

Unfortunately, I ran out of steam towards the end, and the story that got implemented is very, very, VERY short. I'm hoping to implement several more little stories (ie. chapters) as time goes on.

Thanks for playing!

Controls

Keyboard:

  • W, A, S, D or ARROW KEYS = move your character
  • SPACE or ENTER = interact

Mouse:

  • Left click = move your character AND/OR interact

Gamepad:

  • D-PAD or LEFT ANALOG STICK = move your character
  • A or B = interact
